file.body:
//-- start of Menu -----------------------------------------------------
Menu.home Home
Menu.buying Buying
Menu.selling Selling
Menu.renting Renting
Menu.contactus Contact Us
Menu.aboutus About Us
Menu.news News
Menu.project Projects
//-- end of Menu -----------------------------------------------------
//-- start of contact us -----------------------------------------------------
ContactUs.title Please feel free to contact us!
ContactUs.yourname Your Name
ContactUs.youremail Your Email
ContactUs.emailcontent Email Content
ContactUs.submitbutton Send Message
ContactUs.successfullSent Your email has been successfully sent! Thank you!
ContactUs.spamChecking Please help us to stop spam
ContactUs.spamCheckingError Please Type In
//-- end of contact us -----------------------------------------------------
//-- start of about us -----------------------------------------------------
AboutUs.aboutUs About Us
//-- end of about us -----------------------------------------------------
//-- start of Login -----------------------------------------------------
username username
password password
//-- end of Login -----------------------------------------------------
//-- start of news letter -----------------------------------------------------
NewsLetter.newsletter newsletter
NewsLetter.email Email Address
NewsLetter.subscribe subscribe
NewsLetter.unsubscribe unsubscribe
NewsLetter.invalidEmailAddr Invalid Email Address
NewsLetter.emailAddrRequired Email Address Required
//-- end of news letter -----------------------------------------------------
//-- start of content -----------------------------------------------------
home.left homepage left
home.right homepage right
//-- end of content -----------------------------------------------------
//-- start of pagination -----------------------------------------------------
pagination.selectPage Select Page
pagination.goToPage Go To Page
//-- end of pagination -----------------------------------------------------
//-- start of project -----------------------------------------------------
Project.viewDetailsBtn Vew Details
project.houseInfo Vew Details
project.houseDetails Property Description
project.images Property Images
project.map Map
//-- end of project -----------------------------------------------------
//-- start of content title --------------------------------------------
content.welcome welcome
content.whychooseus why choose us
content.successStories success stories
content.yourBenifits your benefits
content.newsHeadlines News Headlines
content.whatsnew what's new
content.customersays customer says
content.projects Projects
content.usefullinks Useful Links
content.popularServices Services
content.activities Activities
content.readmore Read More
//-- end of content title --------------------------------------------

propertyQuickSearch.title Quick Search
propertyQuickSearch.submitBtn Submit
//-- end of propertyQuickSearch--------------------------------------------
